member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToSentenceCase(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the string to sentence case. Remove all uppercases but add uppercase to the first character.
member.example: the Quick Brown Fox Jumps Over The Lazy Dog. -> The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitByCamelCase(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Split the string in each non-first, non-last uppercase. Only the last consecutive uppercase it splitted. Convert the string from camel case to common. Does the same as .
member.param: If the first letter should be converted to uppercase through .
member.example:
camelCase -> camel Case
PascalCase -> Pascal Case
HTMLCase -> HTML Case

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitByPascalCase(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Split the string in each non-first, non-last uppercase. Only the last consecutive uppercase it splitted. Convert the string from pascal case to common. Does the same as .
member.param: If the first letter should be converted to uppercase through .
member.example:
camelCase -> camel Case
PascalCase -> Pascal Case
HTMLCase -> HTML Case

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitByTitleCase(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Split the string in each non-first, non-last uppercase. Convert the string from title case to common.
member.param: If the first letter should be converted to uppercase through .
member.example:
camelCase -> camel Case
PascalCase -> Pascal Case
HTMLCase -> H T M L Case

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitBySnakeCase(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Split the string in each non-first, non-last underscore. Treats all consecutive underscores as one.
Convert the string from snake case to common.
member.param: If the first letter should be converted to uppercase through .
member.example:
snake_case -> snake case
_snake_case -> snake case
snake_case_ -> snake case
snake__case -> snake case

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.SplitByKebabCase(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Split the string in each non-first, non-last middle score. Treats all consecutive middle score as one.
Convert the string from kebab case to common.
member.param: If the first letter should be converted to uppercase through .
member.example:
kebab-case -> kebab case
-kebab-case -> kebab case
kebab-case_ -> kebab case
kebab--case -> kebab case

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToCapitalWords(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize each word delimited by whitespace
member.example: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog -> The Quick Brown Fox Jumps Over The Lazy Dog

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToPascalCase(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize each word delimited by whitespace and join them together. Does the same as .
member.example:
pascal case -> PascalCase
pAscal CaSe -> PascalCase

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToTitleCase(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize each word delimited by whitespace and join them together. Does the same as .
member.example:
title case -> TitleCase
tItle caSe -> TitleCase

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToCamelCase(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize each word delimited by whitespace and join them together, except the first word which remains in lowercase.
member.example:
camel case -> cameCase
cAmel caSe -> cameCase

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToSnakeCase(System.String)
member.summary: Convert to lowercase and join each word delimited by whitespace with underscores.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToKebabCase(System.String)
member.summary: Convert to lowercase and join each word delimited by whitespace with underscores.
